product.title: The Three Musketeers | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Three Musketeers

Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, and Goofy begin this adventure as lowly street urchins, but rise to the ranks of swashbuckling musketeers when they join forces to save Queen Minnie Mouse from Musketeer Pete, who aspires to take the throne. With friendship on their side, the Musketeers soon discover that they can accomplish anything if they work together as a team. Love blossoms for Minnie and Mickey when Minnie chooses to follow her heart rather than the traditions of the monarch to find her true love. Your child will be exposed to important themes of friendship, loyalty, and determination.

Tie-in Activity: To demonstrate the importance of teamwork, tackle an especially difficult task, such as raking leaves or tidying the pantry, with your child. Remind your child that working together as a team makes any chore easier and more fun.
